column1: Electronic Communications and Computer Engineering MSc
column3: Department of Electrical and Electronic Engineering
column5: This 12 month MSc in Electronic Communications and Computer Engineering allows for study of a variety of topics including:Electronic designCommunicationsSoftware engineeringThe course delivers understanding of the art of electronic engineering and an in-depth study of topics covering modern technology for electronic engineering and communication systems.Our objective is to help you develop the confidence to work as a professional, at ease with the conventions of the discipline, and ready to tackle any area of research in electronic engineering.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
